A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie plays with your expectations of what a Star Wars movie is “supposed” to be. You think you know what to expect and then it does something else. It takes chances that largely pay off. The characters are not just the same characters we’ve all already seen. It’s a different take on the same story without just being a rehash of what has been done before. Long story short This is a good Star Wars
